original_text: It is clear that Jesus did not come to help the angels. He came to help people who are from Abraham's family. 2: Abraham was the ancestor of God's people in the Old Testament. He chose to believe God, even when that was very difficult. So he is like the father of everyone else who believes in God. In this verse, ‘people who are from Abraham's family’ means people who believe in Jesus. See Genesis 15:1-6, Hebrews 11:8-12, 17-19 and John 8:39. It is clear that Jesus did not come to help the angels. He came to help people who are from Abraham's family. 2: Abraham was the ancestor of God's people in the Old Testament. He chose to believe God, even when that was very difficult. So he is like the father of everyone else who believes in God. In this verse, ‘people who are from Abraham's family’ means people who believe in Jesus. See Genesis 15:1-6, Hebrews 11:8-12, 17-19 and John 8:39. It is clear that Jesus did not come to help the angels. He came to help people who are from Abraham's family.
korean_text: 이는 확실히 천사들을 붙들어 주려 하심이 아니요 오직 아브라함의 자손을 붙들어 주려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: of God's people in the Old Testament
even when that was very difficult
So he is like the father
of everyone else who believes in God
means people who believe in Jesus
